name: Escapestronaut
description:
Navigate a crashed spaceship, follow the ship's artificial intelligence instructions and make it to the escape pod.

All project files are available at: https://github.com/HamzaEzzRa/Escapestronaut-LostRelicGamesJam

I originally made this for the 2022 lost relic games jam. Theme: Connection

Credits:

  • Menu Music: Magic Space - CodeManu
  • Background Music: Out There - yd
